readable.title: 1124448967_2221af8dc5
readable.content: A half naked man is sleeping on his chair outdoors . An older man sits back and relaxes on a patio outside an adobe building where many bicycles are propped . A shirtless man in a white cap relaxes in a deck chair , close to three parked bicycles . Man relaxing in a folding chair on the street . Topless old man wearing slippers , navy blue pants and a white hat while reclining in a chair outside .
